metadata.description: This is the official adaptation of the original screenplay for Alien 3, written by William Gibson, the award-winning science fiction author of the cyberpunk cult classic Neuromancer. You'll see familiar characters and places--but not all is the same in this horrifying Cold War thriller! Collects William Gibson's Alien 3 #1-#5. Variant covers by James Harren, Daniel Warren Johnson, Paolo Rivera, and Tradd Moore. ''Dark Horse brings us THE biggest missed opportunity within the sci-fi world the legendary and mind-blowing script for the third movie of the franchise by cyberpunk literary giant William Gibson.'' - Outright Geekery
metadata.name: William Gibson's Alien 3
